00013 * Constructor of XYZ format which can use frames
00014 * @param filename Name of the file to be read.

00017 SpinachGUI::XYZ::XYZ(String^ filename, Model^% model)
00018 {
00019         SystemModel=model;
00020         FileName=filename;
00021         ReadingFile = gcnew StreamReader(filename);
00022     FormatName="XYZ";
00023 }

00025 /**
00026 * Main function for opening and reading file
00027 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00028 */
00029 bool SpinachGUI::XYZ::LoadFile(void)
00030 {
00031         bool  OK = true;
00032         bool read_once=false;   //Initializing flags to false, meaning that no any frame was yet read
00033         
00034         //Turn off Refreshing for faster importing
00035         AtomCollection->Refreshing=false;
00036 
00037         //Read the file until the end of it and as long flag OK is true
00038         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream  && OK )
00039         {
00040                 int totalAtoms=0;                                       //total number of atoms in the system
00041                 String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00042                 int AtomID=1;                                           //Saving the atom ID
00043                 
00044 
00045                 //Read number of atoms, checking first if it is an empty line to ignore
00046                 if((fileline=ReadLine())->Length==0) continue;
00047                 if (!Int32::TryParse(fileline, totalAtoms )) OK=false; 
00048 
00049                 //Maybe there is a comment line
00050                 fileline=ReadLine();
00051                 try
00052                 {
00053                 //Number of Fields: 4, Isotope index: 0, XYZ index: 1,2,3
00054             ExtractIsotopeAndCoordinates(fileline, FormatName, read_once, AtomID, 4, 0, 1, 2, 3, 1.0, AtomCollection);
00055                 totalAtoms--; //Reduce totla atoms by one
00056                 }
00057                 catch(Exception ^ /*e*/) {/*Do nothing as can be comment */};
00058 
00059                 //Read the line format: C                 0.4865   -0.1848    1.3191   //
00060                 for(int i=0;i<totalAtoms;i++)
00061                 {
00062                         //Try to read a line from the file
00063                         try {fileline=ReadLine();}
00064                         catch(Exception ^ e)
00065                         {
00066                                 throw gcnew Exception("Unexpected end of file in Line "+LineCount+":"+e->Message);
00067                         };
00068 
00069                         //Number of Fields: 4, Isotope index: 0, XYZ index: 1,2,3
00070                         ExtractIsotopeAndCoordinates(fileline, FormatName, read_once, AtomID, 4, 0, 1, 2, 3, 1.0, AtomCollection);
00071                 };
00072 
00073                 read_once=true;//read at least once
00074         };
00075 
00076         //Turn on again Refreshing which causes calculation of bonds
00077         AtomCollection->Refreshing=true;
00078         ReadingFile->Close();
00079         return OK;
00080 
00081 }
